description:
× 800+ STUDENTS ARE TAKING THIS COURSE RIGHT NOW ×

★ ★ ★ ★ ★ All 5-Star reviews!

NEW BONUS: I've added exclusive discount/free codes for some of the featured landing page builders! Combined value of these coupons exceeds this course's price by far.

What if you launch your app business ... and nobody buys from you?

Months of hard work and thousands of $$$ would go straight down the drain.

Your time is far too valuable to just jump into product development head first. Don't you wish you could peek into your customers' heads and realistically assess your chances of building a successful web or mobile app?

⬇ This course will show you exactly how. ⬇

I'll show you can stop guessing and start measuring before paying developers to create your (mobile, web, ...) app.

Having a proof that your idea holds water will help you more confidently pitch it to the most talented technical cofounders who will help you make it happen.

Imagine never hearing another ❝I'm busy❞ when asking developers to work for equity!

Or, you'll be able to hire anybody without worries, knowing that you will eventually make your money back and even make a profit.

This is not some secret blueprint - it's a time and time again proven workflow recommended by Eric Ries, Tim Ferriss, and numerous other respected authorities from the startup community.

In this course, I'll show you step-by-step how I test my own idea for a mobile app, but you can follow along with any business idea:

  • web, or desktop app
  • software-as-a-service
  • infoproduct like an ebook or a course mobile

I want all my students to not only feel inspired, but also follow through with validating their business ideas. By joining this course you'll also get my personal email and Skype support. I'll be by your side when you can't find that button in Phothoshop or when you need help with using landing page builder. You'll need to do the work, but I'll be there to guide you. I'm excited to answer all your questions!

This course is perfect if you have no coding or design skills, but will also help developers who want to save time and steer away from bad ideas before even building them.

Keeping in mind how busy bootstrapping entrepreneurs are, I've kept this course short - it can be completed in less than a single weekend!

Along the way, you'll pick up a number of useful skills that will surely come in handy like:

  • wireframing
  • using Photoshop
  • basic interface design
  • setting up landing pages [+ NEW! Exclusive discount codes for landing builders]
  • basics of copywriting

I'll also let you in on a couple of shortcuts and design hacks that most people don't know.

So go ahead and watch the first two (FREE) lessons to find out what exactly we're going to learn. See you there!
title: I Have an Idea for an App - Now What? Step-by-Step Course
